title: Golem Conjuror

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
> Summon a golem at night.
> If you have summoned all killing golems, you may deal a Powerful attack

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> Your golems you summon can be named. If you do not pick a name, they will default to "Golem."
> You choose what specific golem is summoned.
> You control all golems you summon, being able to make them speak, vote, and act.
> You cannot summon **Exodia the Forgotten Golem**.
> You can only summon each golem once.
> Golems you summon have their win condition changed to your win condition.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: > Kill all who oppose you and your Golems.

desc:
Post 3610
*"That's enough now golems, you've had your fun. Time to take over the town now."*
